summary: Email correspondence from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding missing image and video files extracted from Jeffrey Epstein's devices. The email inquires about empty folders for device NYCO24342 and lists other devices for which files are still pending.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email inquiring about missing image and video files from Epstein devices, working in the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Drop-off of Epstein device files
events.description: Image and video files from Epstein devices were dropped off to the Assistant United States Attorney.

locations: St. Andrew's Plaza, Southern District of New York
keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney is following up on image and video files extracted from Jeffrey Epstein's devices.
Device NYCO24342 had empty folders, indicating no images or videos were extracted from it.
Multiple other devices (NYCO24328, NYCO24329, NYCO24353, NYCO24365, NYCO24366, NYCO24371, NYCO24383) are still pending for image and video files.
The email is dated October 16, 2020, showing ongoing investigation activities after Epstein's death in 2019.
